gpt_comment: ⚠️[DIVERGENT]: Data from Meteoblue contradicts the baseline. Meteoblue shows a high of 14°C (3°C cooler than baseline) and a low of 8°C (4°C cooler than baseline) but does not state rain probability. With this chilly weather, even a donkey would need a blanket in Paris.
